use_cases_desc: Allow conference attendees to explore the event programme with additional multi-media content (e.g. video, audio). Further the tool can show questionnaires to gather feedback.
contribution_desc:
The paper introduces M3PG, a multi-device, multi-user, multimodal conference programme guide. M3PG can be used on a mobile phone, on a public display, or the content on the public display can be controlled with amobile phone. 
The interaction methods include touch, phone input, gestures, voice input, and haptic feedback.

The papers unfortunately does not have many details about the evaluation.
output_modalities: Screen output; Audio output; haptic feedback
